title: Stephon Clark's Autopsy reveal.  Netflix has job openings.  The White House has an Easter Egg Hunt.  Villanova wins NCAA Championship and more!
itunes:title: Stephon Clark's Autopsy reveal.  Netflix has job openings.  The White House has an Easter Egg Hunt.  Villanova wins NCAA Championship and more!
description:
The autopsy for Stephon Clark raises questions about the police. The White House had an Easter Egg Hunt and Tommy has a special Easter poem. Netflix has work for those that can handle a specific task, Villanova takes home the NCAA Championship and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
